### üè¢ Company Overview

We are SIA Piche, a Latvian company specializing in innovative solutions in the fields of construction and IT development. We pride ourselves on pushing boundaries and embracing new technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions for various industries.

# üèóÔ∏è Innovation in Construction

At Piche, we have revolutionized the construction industry by introducing innovative approaches and technologies. We leverage state-of-the-art techniques to improve efficiency, sustainability, and safety in construction projects. Our team incorporates Building Information Modeling (BIM) to create detailed digital representations of structures, enabling enhanced visualization and efficient project management. Additionally, we utilize advanced materials and construction methods to optimize energy consumption and reduce environmental impact.

Our focus on innovation extends to optimizing the construction process itself. We employ modular construction techniques, allowing for faster and more cost-effective project delivery. By integrating automation and robotics, we streamline repetitive tasks and improve productivity on construction sites. Furthermore, our commitment to safety is evident in the implementation of cutting-edge monitoring systems and wearable technologies to ensure a secure working environment.

# üíª Innovation in IT Development

Innovation in IT development plays a crucial role in our overall approach at Piche. We recognize the power of technology to drive efficiency, streamline processes, and deliver exceptional solutions. We leverage the latest software development methodologies, such as Agile and DevOps, to ensure rapid and iterative product development cycles. We harness cloud computing to provide scalable and flexible IT infrastructure, enabling seamless integration and deployment of our software solutions.

Our IT innovation extends to areas such as artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). We develop intelligent systems that leverage data analytics to optimize construction processes, predict maintenance needs, and enhance decision-making. By integrating IoT (Internet of Things) technologies, we enable real-time monitoring and control of construction sites, ensuring timely actions and improved project outcomes.

# üì¶ NPM Package for Innovative Solutions

Introducing our npm package, designed to power amazing and innovative solutions. Our package provides the basic functionality required to implement groundbreaking solutions in various industries. With easy installation and comprehensive documentation, developers can quickly integrate our package into their projects and leverage its capabilities.

# How to Test This Package in Another Project

This guide explains how to test **`piche.npm.core`** inside a different Vite-based project during development.

---

### 1. Build Package

**`pnpm build`**
Make sure the dist folder exists ‚Äî this is what your consuming project will import.

‚úÖ If you make changes to the package, rebuild it before re-testing in the consuming app.

### 2. Navigate to Your Target Project

In the target project, open the **`vite.config.ts`** file and prepare to add alias settings.

```ts
resolve: {
  alias: {
    // add your aliases here
  }
}
```

### 3. Add Alias Configuration

Inside the **`resolve.alias`** section of the config, add the necessary aliases to resolve the local package correctly.
Replace **`your-local-path`** with your own absolute or relative path

```ts
'react': path.resolve(__dirname, 'node_modules/react'),
'react-dom': path.resolve(__dirname, 'node_modules/react-dom'),
'piche.npm.core': path.resolve(__dirname, 'your-local-path/piche.npm.core/dist'),
```
